version_description:
Update to the graphical equaliser.
Fix for various search issues.
Various other bits of awesomeness
-fixes issue with manually entered computers.

-Return of the stop button on the iPhone (you can enable it in settings)
-You can now rearrange the advanced controls
-Various tweaks and fixes.
-Updates to the position/volume controls in the advanced section.
minor fixes
Brand new Today widget lets you control VLC from the Today view.
Various tweaks and fixes
Updated translations

Updated to support split screen mode in the new version of iOS
Updates to improve accessibility (voice-over) support

Fixes today widget.
Fixes issue with advanced controls on iOS7.
Various other tweaks and fixes.

Fixes issue where remote didn't show favourites after restarting app
Improves bonjour scanning

Updated Translations
Updated the internals

Updated Translations
Updated the internals
Updated the internals and fixed the notification widget.
Updated for the latest verison of VLC.
Updated for the iPhone X and VLC 3.0
Translations and internals updated.

Updated for the iPhone X and VLC 3.0
